name: Hooligan Hymnal Server
description: A Node.js app built to manage CRUD ops for your supporter section app

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies and JWT's

SITE_NAME.description: Name of your site displayed in the tab, default Hooligan Hymnal Server

INPUT_LANGUAGES.description: List of input images you plan on using, defaults to ["en"] if empty

TOKEN_EXPIRES.description: Amount of time base App login will be valid for. Default: 1h

REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRES.description: Amount of time extended App login will be valid for. Default: 1d
